name: Heckin' Slimes
description:
This is submission for Fifty-Fifty Game Jam 2019. The theme was "Long Hair" and the game took 4th place.

Help the girl  to get back her blue, magic hair from sneaky slimes that stole them while she was sleeping. 

The longer hair you have the greater attack range you get. Also remember that flying uses up your hair.

Controls:

AWSD - Movement

SPACE - Jump

DOUBLE SPACE - Fly (Only available when you restore hair)

LMB - Attack
